segments.text: Did you promise me to get the bread ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I remember walking pass the baker shop .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But you forgot to get the bread .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid so . I don't remember you telling me about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What would you let me do now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are free . You can go now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . That's not enough . I've got some cereal .
segments.speaker: S2
